name: 古碧源
objective:
線性電路；電算放大器；二極體；非線性電路應用；接面場
效電晶體（JFET）；金屬氧化物半導體場效電晶體 (MOSFET)
；雙極性接面電晶體（BJT）；差動放大器；多級放大器。金
氧半電晶體；雙接面電晶體；差動及多極放大器；功率放大
器；頻率響應；回授；類比積體電路；濾波器；調諧放大器
；振盪器。
schedule:
1 (2/19,20): Biasing
2 (2/26,27): 2/27 Discrete-circuit amplifiers; 
3 (3/5,6): IC biasing
4 (3/12,13): Basic gain cell and CG/CB amplifiers
5 (3/19,20): 3/19 CD/CC amplifier; 3/20 School Sports Day
6 (3/26,27): Transistor pairings
7 (4/2,3): multi-stage amplifeirs
8 (4/9,10): MOS differential amplifiers
9 (4/16,17): 4/16 mid-term exam; 4/17 differential amplifiers
10 (4/23,24): Basics of feedback
11 (4/30,5/1): Feedback voltage amplifiers
12 (5/7,8): Other feedback amplifier types
13 (5/14,15): Basics of output stages, Class A and Class B amplifiers
14 (5/21,22): Class AB amplifiers
15 (5/28,29): Transistor high-frequency model, High-frequency response 
16 (6/4,5): Low-frequency response
17 (6/11,12): Basic filter concept, in-classroom homework,
18 (6/18): Final exam
scorePolicy:
期中考試：40%
期末考試：45% 
平時與出勤考核：15%
materials: Microelectronic Circuits, International 8th Ed, Adel Sedra, Kenneth Smith, Tony Chan Carusone, & Vincent Gaudet, Oxford University Press, 2021.
consultation: 上課提問；Office Hours 個別諮詢，必要時由助教進一步輔導。
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）SDG7：可負擔的潔淨能源（Affordable and Clean Energy）SDG8：尊嚴就業與經濟發展（Decent Work and Economic Growth）SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）SDG12：負責任的消費與生產（Responsible Consumption and Production）
remarks: 因應疫情防疫規定，若學校宣布調整教學方式為遠距教學，則採用 Google Meet 遠距教學。各次考試也採遠距考試，教師用 Google Meet 螢幕分享考題，並將電子檔傳送至上課班級群組。考試開始後老師在 Google Meet 逐一唱名點名，時間到學生必須在限定時間內以 email 寄交答案。
